text: Shop Smart, Save Money is a British television series which used to be called The Gadget Show. It focuses on technology and is shown on Channel 5. It has progressed from 30 minutes to 1 hour long. Each week there are various features and tests, as well as a weekly competition. The show tries to have enough information but not too much so that it bores people. It has been on television since 2004. == Other websites == * Category:2004 British television series debuts Category:2000s British television series Category:2010s British television series Category:Channel 5 (UK) television programmes Category:English-language television programs
title: The Gadget Show
